title: Political Aftershocks in Haiti, Five Years Later + "The Internet Is Not The Answer"
teaser: POLITICAL AFTERSHOCKS IN HAITI, FIVE YEARS LATER: Five years ago, a devastating earthquake brought Haiti to its knees. The disaster sparked a global effort to help the country rebuild, but half a decade later, its democracy is still on shaky ground. Kojo explores the political aftershocks of the quake and whatâ€™s at stake in Haiti's long-delayed elections. (20 min.) "THE INTERNET IS NOT THE ANSWER": Kojo talks with tech veteran Andrew Keen about the promise and pitfalls of the Internet, and what it means to both embrace and be critical of technology. (30 min.)
